data.text: You people of Israel, listen to what Yahweh says:
“Do not act like the people of other nations act,
The customs of the people of other nations are worthless.
Then people decorate the idol with silver and gold.
Then the idol stands there like [SIM] a scarecrow in a field of cucumbers/melons!
Yahweh, there is no one like you.
You are the king of all the nations!
Those people who think that they are very wise [IRO] are stupid and foolish [DOU].
People hammer into thin sheets silver from Tarshish and gold from Uphaz,
But Yahweh is the only true God;
You Israeli people, tell this to those people: “Those idols did not make the sky and the earth, and they will disappear from the earth.”
But Yahweh made the earth by his power;
When he speaks loudly, there is thunder in the sky;
People are senseless and know very little [HYP];
Idols are worthless; they deserve to be ridiculed;
But the God whom we Israelis worship is not like those idols;
Yahweh says this to the people of Jerusalem:
I will soon throw you out of this land
The people replied, “It is as though we have been badly wounded,
It is as though our great tent is destroyed;
Our leaders [MET] no longer have any sense;
Listen! Our enemies’ armies in the north are making a very big noise/commotion
Yahweh, I know that no person controls what will happen to him;
So correct/discipline us, but do it gently.
Punish [MTY] all the nations whose people do not acknowledge/say that you are God;
